nodes.text: The Lancer was a Corellian frigate in the New Republic's Rapid Response Task Force.
In 5 ABY, it was commanded by Captain Tirossk and participated in the infamous Battle of Mindor.
The Lancer was a decrepit Corellian frigate. The crew gave her the affectionate nickname "Old Cuss 'n' Whack", these being the two foremost ways of repairing her.
